caption:
This photograph captures a vibrant street scene set against an urban backdrop. The main focal point is a large statue centered in the frame, which stands atop a pedestal. The statue, seemingly of a historical figure draped in flowing robes, faces away from the viewer, adding a sense of mystery and grandeur.

In the foreground, the statue is surrounded by a circular arrangement of colorful flowers, mainly red and pink, which provide a bright contrast to the gray tones of the statue and pedestal. Around the statue, several people are engaged in various activities. A group of individuals is gathered around the base of the statue, some leaning on it while engaging in conversation.

The street behind this focal area features classical-style buildings with decorative facades that suggest a European urban setting. Storefront signs can be seen, including one that says "Zur Brieftaube" and another displaying “Piano.” This mix of elements indicates a bustling commercial area.

Other details include a yellow car partially visible to the left side of the frame, indicating the presence of a road beside the pedestrian area. The overall atmosphere is busy yet relaxed, typical of a city snapshot capturing daily life and architectural beauty.
title: Pedestrian-only zones, which have been established on three of the main streets of the inner city, have lead to a 70% reduction in air pollution in the area.
